title: Analog out of range?
body: hi each time i try to play league my screen goes black and it says "analog out of range" ive tried uninstalling the game but nothing has worked thus far and its caused me to leave MANY games. what can i do?

replies.body:
It seems like this could be a resolution issue, but one simple fix we have is resetting your config to default by deleting the Config folder. To test this...

 - Go to the file location at **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends** and delete the 'Config' folder
 - Open LoL again, and test the settings in a Custom or Practice game (don't risk a real game!)

The issue should be solved with that, but if it happens again you know where to find me. Keep in touch if you need more help! :D
